titles.title: Traffic Reduction Through Technology Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for teleworking.
Traffic Reduction Through Technology Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Traffic Reduction Through Technology Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain employers and employees a tax credit for teleworking. Bases the amount of the tax credit for employers on the number of days during the week their employees telework. Limits the annual credit amount for employers to $15,000 and for employees to $250.
